website_summaries.verdict: The slickly designed BeatsX is an appealing neckband-style wireless headphone that offers a lot of the "magic" of Apple's AirPods in a more conventional, sports-friendly design.
pros: The BeatsX is a comfortable, lightweight, water-resistant, neckband-style Bluetooth headphone with a secure in-ear fit and good sound quality
It pairs instantly with Apple devices, rolls up to fit in an included carrying case, and charges quickly via Lightning, not MicroUSB
cons: cords may seem a bit long for some users

customer_reviews.title: Bought on June 8th, died on October 7th.
customer_reviews.text: Be ready to spend 100+ dollars on these great headphones that will last approximately 30 uses. Highly disappointed in the durability of these headphones. I only used these headphones twice a week. -Great working headphones when they are working. -Avoid the headache of sending out for repairs and buy something else, wish i did... -There are 200+ posts on apple's forum with the same issue (several people claiming to replace 2-3x already). You've been warned... -My first Amazon review, I just want to help someone else avoid a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Chau

customer_reviews.title: As usual BEATS work great for a very short time
customer_reviews.text: As usual BEATS work great for a very short time.. brought these on March 18,2018 and they no longer work. I am a 52 woman and I take very good care of them - I didn't over charge them - kept them in there case when not using them - have not used them on the beach (weather still not hot in NY). I did everything advised by the Beats rep.. The last time i was told that I over charged them, funny the same thing happened for the 3x trying BEATS.. I am DONE need to find reliable not popular.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few few bluetooth headphones and they didn't last and they didn't have a good battery life. I decided to try these out and so far so good. My calls are clear the battery lasts 8 hours and they charge really fast. The only complaint I have is I wish they had a little more bass and the price. I would suggest getting a protection plan with these headphones because headphones can be unpredictable. Update: I've had these earphones for 8 months and they aren't working now... Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Ileen Smith

customer_reviews.title: WARRENTY IS WORTHLESS!
customer_reviews.text: Apple will not honor their warranty - they look for any reason to invalidate it. Took 6 month old earbuds into Apple store because they would not turn on. Received an e-mail two days later stating that one of the ear piece screens was bent and that meant the device was damaged and the warranty was invalid. Bent screen in ear piece effecting defective battery/wiring - no way! Just another Apple legal maneuver to get out of standing behind their products. Going back to Bose - had multiple items for 25 years - great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Good if they work.....
customer_reviews.text: Crapped out on me in less than a year. Used these as my main earphones when walking to my classes and for when I studied. Never used them to run in so no sweat got into them and never took them out when it was raining or snowing. Took really good care of them and they stopped holding a charge and then when I thought they fixed themselves they eventually just stopped charging all together... very disappointed that I've spent all this money only for them to work a couple of months....
customer_reviews.author: Amy Louie

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After Six Months
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these in March (2018) and used them for my morning commute on the train, keeping them in my backpack when not in use. Today, the sound has completely cut out in one of the earbuds. Despite all the troubleshooting, nothing has worked to fix this issue. They were great while they worked, but..six months? That's it? Won't be buying any products of this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher C.

customer_reviews.title: There are better options...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these didn’t last me a year. The ear wings have broken twice, and now 9 month after purchase they won’t turn on. The charge light glows red when charging, white when charged but the power button no longer works. The sound from these is muted. I came from a pair of Jaybird X2s and while those were not quite as comfortable as the Beats, they sounded three times better.
customer_reviews.author: Menudo Bandito

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and convenient, but not durable
customer_reviews.text: I liked these a lot when I first got them - sound quality is pretty good, battery life is great, charging is super quick, and being able to charge with a lighting cable is very convenient. Unfortunately, they started to fall apart after about a year - the sound in the right earbud stopped working completely - and they recently stopped powering on at all, about 18 months after I bought them. I have two other friends with the same headphones, and both have had issues as well. It's a shame they're not made well, as I really liked them otherwise. I do not recommend purchasing them.
customer_reviews.author: Peaks

customer_reviews.title: I love my BeatsX earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my BeatsX on Monday May 13 and I got them May 15. Because of the Amazon Prime. I love my BeatsX earbuds. But don't by the BeatsX without the mophie. Because as you can see from the pictures I uploaded the charging cord is very small. Now; the sound is great and when you talking the other side can hear you very well. Make sure you watch the videos on YouTube b4 buying. I want all of you know that my review is personal and I don't work for the company.
customer_reviews.author: jamal

customer_reviews.title: Died after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: In general good, but lasted about 8 months...for this price I was expecting better lifetime let’s see if apple makes me pay for repair, hopefully not
customer_reviews.author: VYK

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED from 4 star to 5 star review
customer_reviews.text: I absoultely loved these headphones and it says they are compatible with android products. I use both android and apple constantly and these would only sync with my apple products. So sadly, I had to return them. They were very comfortable and very high quality. *UPDATE* I loved these headphones I bought them again and had to fumble with them for a little bit until it finally connected to my andriod. Im very happy they did end up connecting!
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad A

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE!!! No Longer Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is an update to a review I posted some time ago. That review was negative, but I have determined that the fault was not with the Beats, but with my aging iPod!!! I apologize for my error. I have a new iPod and the Beats work and sound great!!!!! FOUR STARS!!!! I will add the fifth star when I have had a chance to evaluate sound quality over the fully-functional bluetooth connection for a period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Yates

customer_reviews.title: ease of use and just overall aesthetics these are the best. I had the Powerbeats and they are just ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m a frequent business traveler and I’ve tried a lot of earbuds. In terms of comfort, ease of use and just overall aesthetics these are the best. I had the Powerbeats and they are just too big, uncomfortable and bulky. I love the fact that the BeatsX hang comfortably around my neck while not in use and the magnets keep them secure. So far the battery capacity is good and the fact that they charge with a lightning cable is very convenient. They easily pair with iPhone 8 and my Apple TV which is great for watching tv at night while my wife is sleeping. Love the BeatsX.
customer_reviews.author: tumbleweed

customer_reviews.title: the two things in the middle are too heavy
customer_reviews.text: If you want to work out with them - don’t get them, they are not comfy for jumping ropes or anything fast movement. If your are a female and wants to lift (front squats or put a bar between your neck) the two things that are in the middle get in your way and it get very uncomfortable to lift weight. Range: great Other than that the thing is too heavy and always getting out of my ears bc the two things in the middle are too heavy I will recommended only for running if so.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Q.

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE, WE'VE BEEN RIPPED OFF!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the biggest waste of money I've ever experienced in my life. Bought these to use as wireless bluetooth headphones for work and upon connecting to my work laptop the sound quality was absolutely terrible and basically unusable. I figured maybe it was my computer and I'd keep the headphones for another use.. now, I grabbed the headphones that have been unused since my very first connection and they won't even turn on. When I charge them, a solid white lite appears but as soon as it's disconnected from power the thing wont turn on. Absolute brick and I will never buy anything Beats related ever again. F this company!
customer_reviews.author: Lazaros

customer_reviews.title: these headphones stopped working after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: A complete waste of money. I'm super disappointed. I used to use Bose Wireless headphones and really liked them, when I was traveling I saw these headphones well promoted so I ordered them on Amazon. I used them, they worked well for 1 month, then one day just stopped working. When I charge them, the lights go on, but after even a whole day of charging, nothing comes on... I don't know what to do. I went back to using my Bose Wireless Headphones (Soundsport) - they are two years old and fantastic. I would love to use these beats headphones but unfortunately, they aren't functional.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, okay sound weak battery
customer_reviews.text: Got these more expensive BeatsX wireless headphones after losing a pair of cheap $30 headphones. The BeatsX cost four times more but did not sound any better. The microphone was muffled, I always had to hold it next to my mouth when making a call. During the COVID quarantine I ended up using the headphones for calls all the time and felt frustrated that I had to recharge the BeatsX earphones twice a days. They finally broke when a small piece of plastic mesh broke from one of the earbuds, making that earbud too loud.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria B

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a pair of wireless ear buds that would A) not break, B) not get lost, C) have a long battery life, and D) have great microphone quality. These buds met those criteria and more! I love the weighted "neck chain" connector that keeps them properly situated around my neck. The magnetic buds stick together when I'm not using them, which makes them nearly impossible to lose. The battery life is amazing. I use them all day long and only charge at night. And the microphone quality is PERFECT. . . so much better than the earbuds that came with my iPhone and have to be replaced every 2-3 months. So good!
customer_reviews.author: Joel P. Pitney

customer_reviews.title: Never turned on
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a backup, just in case I lost or misplaced the Beats I already had. And sure enough, the sad day arrived that I couldn’t find my, daily use ones. I was so excited to open the new package, that it took the sting of losing the first pair, somewhat. I take these out of the box, charge them, and they won’t turn on. Nothing worked. I rebooted them. Still nothing. And I’m well beyond the one-year warranty period. I totally accept that it’s my own fault. I’m sharing this story so that you can learn from my mistake. Thanks for reading. God Bless you!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Broke with crackling noise immediately
customer_reviews.text: I chose these headphones for the following reason: Their earplugs are the only ones I have seen (in the Bluetooth category) that are small enough to fit in your ear fully and not bother you when you lay down on your side in bed. I like the length of the overall wire, weight and controls. The battery life is good. Unfortunately the left side of these earphones immediately blew and started crackling (sizzling noise) when I turned the volume up for a pop song. I returned them. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Finally found headphones that stay in!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been searching for a pair of Bluetooth headphones that I could exercise in and wouldn’t fall out of my ears. I must have weird ears because I’ve tried various headphones with no luck. Enter BeatsX. I tried them on in an Apple Store and thought they were okay but it wasn’t until I tried the wing tips that I discovered they stayed in! They ended up being on sale on Amazon so I bought them here instead of in store. The only thing I wasn’t thrilled with is the sound quality. There seems to be lack of bass compared to headphones such as AirPods. But I deal since they actually stay in my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: These don't stay charged very long, at least for me. And most frustratingly, they don't stay in my ears. I've tried all the various sized ear bud covers and none of them work. The flexible cord that goes around the neck tangle a bit too. I had some cheaper bluetooth earbuds that functionally worked better but were more challenging to pair so I thought I'd upgrade to the Beats which are supposed to be more Apple iphone-friendly. However, they were not ergonomically friendly. Feel I wasted a good deal of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Reinert

customer_reviews.title: are very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: These have rich sound, are very easy to set up, and comfortable to wear...The kit comes with 4 different ear tip sizes and 2 different sport tip options, as well as a small rubbery holding case (minor: not crazy about the case, as it has an open top with no way to close it). I love the way the headphone buds magnetically click together, so they don't fall or get tangled. I do not use them for cell phone calls but am going to try them with the sport tips next to see if they will stay in without issue. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly R

customer_reviews.title: Awesome earphones
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headphones these are legit beats, awesome battery life and sound and I like you can pop these in and out if someone talks not like the power beats. Not good for work or in an environment where people talk I can’t hear anything which is a good thing in most cases.the sound on these is lovely as well. Love that they have a magnet and snap together on your neck. I don’t like how I get confused where I’m supppsed to turn off the earphones I get it confused with the charging thing since their on opposite sides. Have had these for months now and can say they’re worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!!!! Stopped working after 3 months - lousy customer support from Apple.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for our son. Sound was really good, BUT stopped working after 3 months. Would not turn on after charging. Crappy support/service from Apple. Apparently this is a common problem with this model of Beats. Apple makes it very difficult to get a replacement - even when you spend a good amount of money on the product. Buy Anker wireless headphones instead. Sound is nearly as good and WAY cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: JBW

customer_reviews.title: Product doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Dec 2017. Date of first review, 9/2018. Date of second review, 3/29/2019 1. First review: For 9 months, they have been great. A couple weeks, the product started exhibiting technical difficulties: automatically raising volume, multi-song skips, initiating Siri, not powering off on demand. Stopping the above mentioned Issues required plugging in to the charger. This was only a temporary fix, at least to shut them off. But same issues came up again during subsequent uses. Not sure if issues can be resolved. Irritated. These weren’t cheap. 2. Second review: One year and 3 months later, they are dead. They will not charge at all. Disappointed by not surprised after seeing further reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Living Great!

customer_reviews.title: BeatsX stopped pairing reliably after 5 months...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these headphones, but they stopped pairing reliably after 5 months. I can connect the headphones for a minute or so, but then it fails / disconnects. I'm very frustrated. The sound was pretty good, and call clarity was also good although I would sometimes get complaints about wind noise. The battery life was decent - I don't know the true battery life per charge, since I generally kept the headphones charging whenever I wasn't using them. I could use the headphones for 3 to 4 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Wallen

customer_reviews.title: I will never buy this product again, bought this ...
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy this product again , bought this in December last year and it stopped working in March after 3 months, just the way i bought one July last year and I used it for only 5 months. I took it back to apple store and they wanted to repair at a cost higher than the amount I could get another one on amazon in spite of the warranty period on it. This product is a scam
customer_reviews.author: Oluwatobi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had 3 different pairs of beats and have always loved them. Apparently Apple hasn’t done them any favors in the quality department! My First pair of Beats X Earbuds needed to be replaced within 6 months. They would not take a charge or turn on. Was issued a warranty pair and they too had the same problem within a year. I’ve read many other complaints with the same issue. Now they want to charge me for a new pair because I’m outside of “Limited” warranty. Good to know they stand behind their product. Sincerely, New Bose Customer
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for about 2 weeks and use them regularly at my desk at work. I don't use them for exercise so I can't rate them from that aspect. But they have good sound quality and the noise cancellation is good. I can walk downstairs in my office and not lose connection, more than 50 feet at least. They hold a charge for at least 8 hours and only take 45 to fully recharge. The only time I get spotty sound is when my WiFi connection loses strength. I also like that they are magnetic, and they feel very secure around my neck. Pricey but worth it in my opinion. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth This Chunk of Change
customer_reviews.text: Someone in my family bought the same style headphones but in a different color. The person had to replace his headphones twice within the first 4 months of his purchase. I looked at the situation as always because I always take care of my items until I ran into some problems with my headset last month. Lucky for me I was still under warranty and at the Apple store they replaced mine for free. My headset in particular would have a shortage on the left ear. The person I mentioned in this review had problems with his headphones not turning on.
customer_reviews.author: Monocula

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Love them!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a second time I purchasing the same headphones from this seller. The story goes, I got ones in grey for someone Christmas present, and person was very satisfied, I got a chance to play with them as well. When my iPhone headphones finally died on me, I decide to splurge and got myself this pair. I am in love with my headphones! Sound is amazing! So comfortable and light weight. Charge very fast and last for long time. We able successfully pair them with iPhone, Droid phones, PC and Mac computers. So yeh! Well love them! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Iryna

customer_reviews.title: Beats X Headphones Blue
customer_reviews.text: These Beats X headphones are really amazing. You can hear base but it’s not thumping like other Beats products like you would expect. Great music output. Transfer does not lag or have any noticeable difference from hearing music right from phone. When talking it sounds like I’m on headphones but no noticeable outside noise or interference. Was told I was coming in crisp and clean over the phone on the headphones. Controls work really easily and if you have an iPhone, Siri you can do all sorts of things. If you want more base then maybe you should get the PowerBeats 3 or etc. They have a little more base to them. I highly recommend these if you are searching.
customer_reviews.author: Chris_W

customer_reviews.title: Poor build quality, product does not last
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of BeatsX just crapped out on me after a few months of use. I don't abuse them -- they're either on my neck, on the charger, or in the little rubber case. Nevertheless, they now refuse to turn on. There is no visible damage, and no notable incident between when they worked fine yesterday to when they didn't work this morning. This same scenario happened with the first pair. I'd sent them back to Apple they sent back photos showing "damage" that was not there before I sent the pair in. I'm expecting the same with this pair. Save your money, don't buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Just another geek

customer_reviews.title: These things are infuriating. I was excited to get ...
customer_reviews.text: These things are infuriating. I was excited to get bluetooth headphones and leave the tangled mess of my wired headphones behind but these proved to be equally frustrating. Often I get popped off of the headphone input mid-call or a call coming in doesn't give me the option to answer on the headphones when they're on and charged up and I have to scramble to figure it out. It's also hard to know if they're on or off, you have to take them off to see if the light is on. They're also too long and gangly.
customer_reviews.author: Heddaville

customer_reviews.title: the insurance care package and the head phone are not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Though I love this product also have a huge issue with it. I got them as Christmas gift in 2017 buy June 2018 I got the “red light of death” they were working perfect then made the noice to let me know the batteries were low plugged them in an hour later went to go use them and they would not turn on. After getting all this and them being replaced now in November of 2019 they have once again stopped working!!!! They will not replace the headphone as they said that they already did. I got a 5 year warranty on them and they don't seem to care!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ian lafferty

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Sound, Deeply Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These things sound terrible. I had better sounding ear buds back in the 90s. Sure, they fit great (thanks to the choice of plugs), but they sound weak and they don't even vaguely block out any other sounds. The only other saving grace is that they include the Apple chip that makes them work and pair with an iPhone just like Air Pods. But that's it. Avoid these toys. I bought the Bose SoundSports (wireless but also connected ear-ear) and they sound 10x better, fit about the same (although they are much bigger), and work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones! Use them for work and for daily walks. The included wing tips help them stay snug in the ear, without being all bulky like they are with the Powerbeats. So that was pleasent surprise since i was trying to pick between the 2. They ahve great range esp when used with apple products like iphone / macbook. I did get them on sale, which helped the cause since they can be a little pricey. If looking for great bluetooth headphones though, can't go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A. Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Skip and go for the Powerbeats
customer_reviews.text: I am incredibly disappointed in this product. I’m an advocate of Beats, and I have both the wireless Studio headphones and the Powerbeats. I purchased these Beatsx for a more comfortable ear option, especially during sweaty workouts. I feel that Beats have failed me for the first time by sacrificing their premium sound. Highly recommend paying the slight extra and opting for the Powerbeats, since these Beatsx sound comparable to the Apple earbuds included with your iPhone. Though as usual, the packaging and out of box experience is superb, I just wish the Beatsx were on the same level as the rest of the product line
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Great Connection!
customer_reviews.text: Sound great and fit very well - especially with the 'wings'. Call clarity is very nice as well. I love how they charge using the same lightning connector as the iPhone. And they pair effortlessly - just turn them on and the phone immediately sees them. The connection is great too - walked about 25 feet away to another room and they sounded excellent. However, the scraping of the rubberized cords against my jaw is transmitted directly to my ears, so I gave them to a family member who loved them. Will be looking at something that doesn't do that.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Beats didn’t disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: They’re beats, they don’t disappoint! It’s been ages since I’ve bought them and they still work very well! -Sound quality is phenomenal! -Noise cancellation is good here for us New Yorkers especially when there’s a crying infant on the bus or the train! -Mic sensitivity is good, so good that when calling, FaceTiming, or on a chat on Discord on the go my friends would complain that it’s a bit too loud
customer_reviews.author: Mikey2416

customer_reviews.title: You will not lose these!
customer_reviews.text: Great item for those who are transitioning from the ubiquitous white earbuds and moving to wireless. Also good for those who are nervous that they would immediately lose the 'stringless' earbuds by that same company! These wireless headphones have great sound, come with several sized nubs to get perfect fit, and stiff U-shaped loop sits comfortably around neck and keeps earbuds safe when not in use. They also 'clip' together magnetically which is a nice perk. My daughter wears these all day everyday around campus and loves them...the sound is great for phone calls as well, very clear and no need to hold phone close while speaking. 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Miki Laurent

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable, but perform well if treated nicely
customer_reviews.text: Compared to LG and many other wireless in-ear monitors, these are tuned for heavy bass and mostly good response. The issue is durability. These are made and supported by Apple, and use the same strange silicon-ish rubber that their charging cables use, so it stretches out after a year or so, killing off one side, for instance. I have had mine replaced question-free by Apple about three times now, so if that is part of their business model on these, I would say the A+ customer support and warranty service (free replacement) is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Beggs

customer_reviews.title: Best ear buds besides the AirPods.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best ear buds for plane travel and other noisy environments. The passive noise isolation from the in-ear design made listening to the music and movies on an airplane very enjoyable. Also, the piece that goes around your neck is hardly noticeable at all because it is very light. The battery lasted through an 8 hour flight, and it charges pretty quickly. These are my go-to ear buds when I need some noise isolation.
customer_reviews.author: G. Lam

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Finally... lightweight, easy to use, fits perfectly and always stays in place. I needed to use the included hangars, but they are easy. Excellent sound quality for phone calls and internet radio. My hearing is not great and I mostly listen to news, so I can't advise anyone on the music quality. Also, you can pull the buds out and just drop them, and the magnets instantly hold them together, so they don't dangle around or drop on the ground. I highly recommend this product. I bought grey from Amazon for $109.00, vs. $149.00 for all other colors except black. $40.00 was a huge savings.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Snider

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, though pricey. I have seen them on special recently for $99, but when I bought they were all $149. Connect easily, decent charge (can use a few times for several 1 hr plus workouts before charge needed). fit ears well, no issues with cord around back of neck (it does stick when you try to move it, but that is probably good, so it does not flop around while exercising). good sound.
customer_reviews.author: SCH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !
customer_reviews.text: I’m not an audiophile but I have been excercising regularly for over 20 years and I never excercise without headphones. So basically I’ve seen them all. Pros: Very light Great sound. Never drops from my ears when exercising. Excellent battery. Apple ! Great design. Very chic and subtle. Cons: Doesn’t get as loud as Sony extra bass range. But it’s maximum volume will be painful to many, I’m just used to very loud music. Not certified for water resistance. But I’ve never heard of a problem with that.
customer_reviews.author: Mo G

customer_reviews.title: Failure of one side
customer_reviews.text: One side of the the headphones stopped working about 6 months after purchasing. I've used these for maybe 4-6 hrs each week, and by the 6th month the left side started going in and out. After another week or two, it went out completely. Now, only the right side works. If I could return these, I would. Otherwise: The sound quality is great. I think the wires are a bit too long, and get annoying at times. But the ease of use, remote volume control and syncing capability are great. I've used this on both Apple and Android products without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad J. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones for every occasion. This are better than my AirPods
customer_reviews.text: Great Headphones, I really like them that I had to get some for my family as gifts and they absolutely love them. Your going to love the fast charging on this 5 min give you 2hrs of music enough for a gym session, if you have an iPhone it will be a great addition to your accessories. Now I was the only one that had a problem with them the right side ear headphone stoped working so I called the support number and wow they where nice and replace my headphones no questions asked. If you want to have peace of mine on great paid of bluetooth headphones this are or you!!
customer_reviews.author: Edgard

customer_reviews.title: Prices name brand, bad quality headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Ive had these since June 2018, it is now October 2018. They randomly will not turn on. For the price I would not recommend these to anyone. Save your money and get the skullcandy wireless pair. They sound the same, they actually connect faster than the beats and apparently they out last the beats by far. Im so unhappy with this purchase. I wasted a lot of money for a pricey name brand and bad quality headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Stomper

customer_reviews.title: Continuously breaking
customer_reviews.text: For the price of beats X I thought the quality of product would be better. I haven't had these headphone for even a year and I have had 3 replacement products already. The most recent replacement I received only 1 week ago and again they are broken. The volume buttons on the headphones do not function and the volume gets turned down randomly during workouts. I can rectify the problem momentarily by resetting the headphones and then eventually they stop pairing all together. I take care of the product, using the carrying case provided and they are used during running and gym workouts only. Very unhappy with the product
customer_reviews.author: Michele Spear

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth headphones yet.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely incredible. The sound quality is nice but the apple, Bluetooth chip sets these apart. Bluetooth headphones that are synced to multiple devices have always been a pain but these are not that way. Instead of trying to connect, and stay connected, to my phone and iPad these allow you to choose. So they dont continually complain about having lost connection to a device that is in another room, or back home when you’re out for a walk. I didn’t like the idea of so much wire being on a wireless set but, these are quite comfortable. And they remain comfortable for a long time, I’m extremely happy that I decided to buy these,
customer_reviews.author: Trevis

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my wife. she was hesitant on the wireless headphone fun crave. she tried my AirPods out, but didn't like how they felt in the ear. So I got her these instead. Now she can't stop talking about how much she loves them. the fact there is nothing attached to the phone means no more snagging on something and ripping the headphones out. the fast charge time allows here to play with them all night and then charge up before work. The easy connect couldn't be better connect with one device on the account allows it to be instantaneously used with all of them. all around couldn't ask for anything better.
customer_reviews.author: Beau Plummer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: Use them with a Samsung Galaxy 7 edge. The bass is very pronounced but not distorted. These really shine in the highs and a bit less on the mids. The strength of these earbuds is the sealing factor that they provide with the wing tips. I was next to a lawn mower and the music totally dominated the sound stage. I could hear the sound of the lawn mower engine but very low. They last a long time and quickly charge. I use them when I am working out but not while running. Highly recommend the Beats X to anyone who is on the fence about them.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: AirPod's More Conservative Little Brother
customer_reviews.text: These have great sound for a Bluetooth ear phones and amazing battery life. I've gotten about 7 hours on a charge. Once paired, they integrate seamlessly with Apple products. The BeatsX can get uncomfortable for me after about an hour of use but this could just be due to the anatomy of my ears. I'm glad I chose these over the AirPods. The BeatsX use basically the same tech as the Gen 1 AirPod with the security of the neck strap and in-ear buds which seal out external noise. I may upgrade to the Gen 2 Airpod when it drops later this year but for now I'm loving the BeatsX.
customer_reviews.author: EVW

customer_reviews.title: Yeets by Dre
customer_reviews.text: I owned these for about six months before they stopped powering on, but Apple replaced them free of charge because the battery on my original pair was defective. Fast forward another six months, and the left earbud has stopped working on my refurbished pair. The repair would have cost $80 out of pocket because I am now outside of the warranty period, but the Apple associate was kind enough to try up selling me to the AirPods. On the plus side, these work fantastically as earplugs and help me avoid human contact in public.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and battery, occasional mic pairing problem.
customer_reviews.text: Pairing was easy. Holds a good charge (6-8 hours). Sound quality is fantastic. Volume is louder than any other earbuds ever used and fit allows for noise to be isolated (best alternative to true noise cancellation) - actually takes some getting used to when you put these in and the outside world noise goes away. Very similar to in-ear studio monitors. Only complaint is they don't always pair the microphone which can be troublesome when trying to take a call, though the sound always pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great, but the on/off tone is hilariously confusing
customer_reviews.text: Look great, sound great... my only complaint is the on/off and battery level notification. When powered on, there is a tone indicating that they're on. When powered off, there is another tone, but the problem is that it sounds ALMOST IDENTICAL to the power on tone. It's hilariously confusing. I end up hitting the little power button a few times to be sure I make the proper selection. Aside from this tiny issue, these are great headphones/earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: JW Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Defective battery
customer_reviews.text: After a long delay in shipping, these headphones worked for about a day. Now they won’t hold a charge. I have another pair that works well, so I don’t know if these are defective or were damaged in shipping, but the process of dealing with the delay and waiting was all a waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: stevensae

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating device
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with these overall. Sound quality is just OK but volume is inadequately low. Ear pieces are very comfortable, but cord is too rigid and won't lie down comfortably. Biggest issues are 1) they won't connect and have to be repaired every time I use them, which can take up to half an hour of fiddling around, and 2) battery life is maybe 4 hours, nowhere near the lie of 8 hours. Wasting half an hour to use a device for 4 hours every day is laughable.
customer_reviews.author: KCZ41

customer_reviews.title: Great audio quality, super simple to link
customer_reviews.text: Got this product refurbished, but it looks like new! Great sound, super easy to pair with my iPhone and iPad with latest iOS version. Came in brown box but all accessories were included, ear tips work great and keep headphones in place. Make sure to install right tip for your ear size, it makes a great difference to improve bass on sound. Oh and a nice surprise! It charges using lightning connector so I can use same cable with my iDevices. This is great, no more hard to insert micro USB connectors!
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Rodriguez-quintero

customer_reviews.title: They pair up within a couple seconds of turning them on and fit comfortably when I run with music or walk the dog ...
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of Bluetooth headphones and having no cord to snag on things is killer. They pair up within a couple seconds of turning them on and fit comfortably when I run with music or walk the dog listening to an audio book. I really have to play around with the ear tips to find a better seal & sound but I’ve frankly been lazy about it. They go plenty loud and feel durable to me. Definitely glad to have them.
customer_reviews.author: BOSOX 737

customer_reviews.title: Great, BUUUT NOT sweat resistant
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased wired Beats earbuds in the past...and they've been through the washer several times and have always worked fine. After several hard workouts, the audio quality on these has suffered tremendously :( Sad to say, I got better performance out of some wireless JBL sweat-resistant earbuds from TJMaxx. Those were a fraction of the cost of these.
customer_reviews.author: SMGreenie

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 so good!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Hands down the best headphones I’ve ever had. The charge lasts forever and when they do die, it only takes five minutes to recharge. The charger is also the same as iPhone which is nice because who likes carrying more than one charger!? They also fit really well and they send you extra ear pieces. It connects to Bluetooth super easy and still picks up the signal when you’re three or four rooms away. They stay in place at the gym whether you’re lifting weights or doing burpees. The sound quality is awesome and they cancel all noise. I would and will buy another pair of these in the future for myself and/or gifts. :)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality was almost comically bad. The sound quality was comparable to a $25 ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality was almost comically bad. The sound quality was comparable to a $25 pair of Anker earbuds I tried immediately after. I was shooketh considering the price. They are also far too long. They totally lack in bass and speaking/vocals off of these were very harsh. I also did not care much for the thicker band that goes around the neck. I returned these.
customer_reviews.author: Gabeh Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Longevity is not one of its features
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in February of 18. It’s now July of 19 and they’ve broken for the second time. First time one of the ear buds went dead and I got a new pair through warranty. Now, they won’t power on at all. They just give me a red and white blinking sequence while on the charger. After that, nothing. Sound quality is decent. Other than the part where they break, they’re good sounding headphones. I just don’t think I should need to replace them every 6 to 9 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: phone+battey+sound 5 stars on all !!!
customer_reviews.text: Believe me I have tried many Bluetooth headphones I needed something that has a nice battery life plus people actually hear me when I talk these two combinations with great sound quality make it worth the money that's my opinion I don't know why the one stars or the two stars I've had it now for over 2 months very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Neyer

customer_reviews.title: Great!...until they stop working
customer_reviews.text: Had my Beats for exactly one year (bought them in April 2018 and it's now May 2019). Very happy. I'm not a big sound person - mostly listened to books. Fit well in my ears. Easy control of volume. Then a week ago, they just stopped connecting to my phone's bluetooth. I've done all the troubleshooting. I've downloaded the new updates from the Beats website...but sadly, they no longer link to my phone. For $100, they should not suddenly stop working. This seems consistent with other reviewers.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Sound is good and they fit in ears.
customer_reviews.text: After the second washing of my ear pods, which finally killed them for good, I bought these. The fact that these stay in the ear make the sound always great. Many folks suffer from the apple ear inserts coming a bit loose with a major loss in sound quality. If the wired ones do that for you then the ear pods will too. Though these stay in, you might be othered with the strap hanging on your neck. It drives me a little crazy, but okay with a collared shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Special for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I got these while on sale because I knew they wouldn’t be worth full price. I wanted them because of the W1 chip, which I though would be more magical, but these were no better than the much better price ADAX headphones I was using. They connect no more easily or less easily. So why would I pay this much? Plus the power button on these is a pain. Too small & fussy. These are not bad, but then they’re not great either.
customer_reviews.author: PBR118

customer_reviews.title: Light and convenient.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I use it for my iPhone (the iPhone charging thing-whatever it's called plugs in to charge it) and although the bass isn't at all comparable to over-the-ear headphones (Beats, Bose), these are perfect for the office. Additionally, didn't realize this had a microphone, and I'm able to summon Siri and also make calls/pick-up calls without any problem. The bluetooth connection is a tad bit awkward, I have to do it via the iPhone setting 30% of the time--but it could be because I'm not sure if I've already turned off/on the headset.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: 5/5 Solid Wireless Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Overall the BeatsX are solid wireless headphones. Have a pair of Bose that are too bulky in your ears but the BeatsX are slim and fit snug in your ear. Sound is good not great, not as loud as i would like (for in loud environments) but good quality when listening in normal environment. Definitely recommend the BeatsX over any other in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Died after 6 moths
customer_reviews.text: It's so much better than I thought it would be, all while it lasted. After 6 months, mine died. I can charge it, but it doesn't stay on, and it just shuts off randomly. Fortunately, it looks like Apple/Beats is going to either fix it or replace it. Still, it shouldn't go bad so quickly so easily, don't you think?
customer_reviews.author: JBJB

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite version of Beats products
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite version of Beats products. With the 8-hour​ battery life and the ability to charge them quickly with a lightning cable (same as the charger for your Apple products) made this the best purchase option. Another great feature of these earbuds is the ability for them to link to your Apple ID account, which makes it possible to switch from using your iPhone with them to your Mac or iPad seamless. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: noble

customer_reviews.title: stopped working in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: My headphones stopped working in less than a year from the time I bought them. When I took them to apple to get them fixed, they said that the Amazon bought them more than a year ago, which means, I can't use Apple's limited warranty that comes with the product. Wish Amazon would have told me that when I was buying the headphones. Now I have to pay out of pocket to get them fixed, which will cost me almost the same price I bought them for.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kamel

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 16 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones in March 2018. I used them 10+ hours a day for both ear protection from loud noises, to listen to podcasts/music, and to talk on the phone. Easy connection to apple phones, comfortable in the ear, did not have complaints from people on other end of phone call. Never had any other issues with them, until today when the right ear bud stopped working. So I got one year and four months out of headphones that costed $99.95, when I bought them. That comes out to about 6$ a month. I am happy and ok with that investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for the so-so sound
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive for the so-so sound, bought them to replace lost bose soundsports but sound quality is way inferior, first and foremost have been using them for some time now and still figuring out which is the left/right headphone, plastic is so hard on the collar making it uncomfortable, plus they don’t fit on the included pouches, buttons so sturdy and doesn’t work, my ears ache after each use, don’t spend your money on this
customer_reviews.author: Story Teller

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: These are my best pair of earbuds right now. With the included wings, they fit securely and have a nice tight seal which prices good sound isolation. Bass and overall sound is good. I got these for $99, which I think was a pretty good deal. Don't much care for the included carrying case, but the buds are magnetic and stick together, which makes it less likely these will fall off when worn around your neck.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ennis

customer_reviews.title: Super light!
customer_reviews.text: Great wireless headphones! I love that they are so light. The sound quality is great. Comes with multiple ear pieces for best fit and sound quality. My only complaint is that they seem a little long for me. I'm 5'3" and they hang down my chest and get in the way when I run.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Elenore

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! They malfunction soon after using
customer_reviews.text: When I first purchased these, they worked like a charm for the first few months. Then problems started happening. The volume would go up and down on its own. People couldn't hear me through the microphone when making a call etc. Since I was still under the warranty, I shipped them back and got a replacement. 1 month later, the EXACT SAME problems started happening. Returned these and got another pair. YET AGAIN, 1 month later or so, volume will change up and down on its own, microphone quality goes down, and bluetooth pairing sometimes doesn't work. So I know it's just an inherent issue with these headphones. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: arun

customer_reviews.title: Defective after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I am incredibly disappointed in these headphones. I’ve had them for a little over a year and they’re already broken. I’ve only used these for the gym and sometimes during work, and for whatever reason, it stopped turning on. After two full charges, and attempting to reset multiple times, I’ve given up on them. I’ve read numerous reviews and instruction manuals but my pair seems to be defective. These were my first Bluetooth, wireless headphone and although I was happy with them at first, the longevity of these completely stink! If you’re looking for an expensive pair of throw-away headphones, you’ve come to the right place.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen B

customer_reviews.title: I fell in love with these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with these headphones, I even threw out or gave away all my other headphones. They only worked for about 2 months, 1st I was having a hard time connecting to my iPhone, then the volume button stopped working, then they would no longer turn on. When I charge them, the red light goes on, but once disconnected from the charger no light comes on. Very disappointed I paid over $100 for these. They were a gift to myself for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Davalos

customer_reviews.title: Short Battery life, but great listening
customer_reviews.text: While I love the BeatsX, the battery life is terrible. I can't get through an 8-hour day without having to charge them. Ex. I charge them on my lunch hour. What I love about them is that they don't have the wire hanging and I can get up and move around without being caught on something or remembering that I am "attached" to something. Once Apple figures out how to extend the battery life, which I am sure they already know...I will be more pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but died twice in 1 1/2 years!
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was very good, but they died on me twice in 15 months. First time one earbud stopped with all sound. Apple was great with the quick replacement. Unfortunately the second time, they kept cycling through power on, connecting and off. Would intermittently connect, then cycle off again. This time they were out of warranty. These were awesome headphones, when they worked. For expensive equipment like this, they should not need replacement twice in 15 months.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn W. Leffler

customer_reviews.title: Horrible battery life, terrible controls.
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is abysmal; nowhere near the standby time advertised. It constantly goes dead on me. Ergonomics are terrible as well; controls are vague and non-intuitive. Even after a month, I find myself fumbling for the buttons. Sound quality is excellent, but for go-to headphones, they just don't cut it. Oh well, I guess I can still use them for exercise, but I've already replaced them for all-around usage.
customer_reviews.author: Tom C

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones based on the good reviews but I was disappointed when I received them. The wire is so bulky and looks silly just hanging there. I wasn’t a fan of the sound either. Ended up returning and buying the Jaybird x3 and very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Resident

customer_reviews.title: Charging Defect, and they know it...
customer_reviews.text: I loved my earphones until they stop charging a week after the year warranty, I contacted Apple and they told me it was going to be $91 something to send them back and repair them... whaaaatttt?... for that I buy a new pair. No grace period after they know these earphones are defective, I have three people at work that have to send them back due to this same problem... 😤😠 I guess no more beats for me 😡😡
customer_reviews.author: Elimar Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Battery Life and Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? These are amazing! I can have them connected the whole day and listen to music and make phone calls with no issues. The iPhone integration is great as well. I can use Siri easily and it connects to my phone within seconds after the first pairing. I can even see the battery percentage by swiping up from the bottom of the screen! At first I thought there was an issue with the mic but you just have to be sure the left headphone is twisted so that the mic hole on the cord is facing forward (see picture). Aside from that this is an amazing buy and a great value. Five stars all around!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: NO BASS RESPONSE
customer_reviews.text: I bought these NEW, not refurbished. Regardless of what type of music I play through them AND any position in my ear they are in- the sound is very tinny. There is lots of treble but almost non-extistant bass. Maybe these are defective. I own a 2 year old wired BEATS ear pods which have great bass and a very balanced sound. I have returned the beatx for a refund. Just be sure you listen to them before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: David F.

customer_reviews.title: Durability is Poor
customer_reviews.text: The first 8 months of owning these were amazing. Super easy pairing with my iPhone and enough bass. The wide cabesl were tangle-proof and I liked how I now only had to bring one cable to charge both my iPhone and these. However, it has now been 8 months and these things will not turn on even after charging. I'm disappointed as these have only been used normally for the past 8 months with just normal everyday use - mostly at the gym. Beats' quality is appalling. Will not be buying Beats products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Desmond Chee

customer_reviews.title: Don't Believe the Hype!
customer_reviews.text: Returned these ASAP!! Do Not Order! I ordered these for my husband and son for Christmas.. Believe it or not, my husband ordered Bose Wireless Headphones for me.. We tried both these sets at the same time and Bose beats the Dre BeatsX to a pulp! The sound quality isn't up to Par, Don't believe the Hype!! We returned the BeatsX.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great sound Easy to pair to iPhone Never lost bluetooth connectivity Wires don’t get tangled like earbuds A lot of options to get a good custom fit The bluetooth range is pretty far Long battery that charges quickly Cons: Wires are long and uncomfortable to me on some days. Kind of expensive Not waterproof
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love them. They work great and they come with this silicon case thing that makes it easy to pack them in my bag. I also love that they have the magnets so when I am wearing them around my neck but I am not using them they don't get it the way or swing everywhere. The sound it great and it works great for phone calls and using siri as well. I recommend them to anyone who asks about them. They are also great for working out because you don't have any annoying cords swinging and getting caught on things.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Now I would like these. I think I would lose the wireless ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend, he says he sometimes has a hard time hearing, but these worked really well for him, and he loves them. Now I would like these. I think I would lose the wireless buds, I am pretty animated when I talk, moving my arms in an "excitedly Italian way", I have lost many earrings when I get excited about a subject. These are very comfortable, easy to "find" and place in ears, and the sound is really good. I would recommend these to anyone, without feeling responsible if someone did not like them ... how could they not? Price was RIGHT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DHamp

customer_reviews.title: Come and go expirience
customer_reviews.text: I had a come and go expirience with this product. 2017 christmas I ordered two of these. Within a few months one of them had sound problems and would either not connect to my device or would not be able to turn on and off. The headphone would show a red right which I couldnt change untill the battery died. But the second set worked great it not having any of the issues mentioned and still works to this day.
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: 2 issues but overall very good
customer_reviews.text: Ok heres my review. Purchased in December 2017....2 concerns for me, the seal is very good in your ear, so you really cant hear anything around you like ear plugs. So running in the street maybe an issue but listening on a train or bus is nice. Second and really a problem for me is the on/off button, sometimes i have to press it multiple times and there is a delay of about 8 sec when turning in. This drives me nuts, very frustrating. Other than those 2 the headphones are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Maria C.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after three months like so many others
customer_reviews.text: Like many others, my expensive BeatsX stopped working after just three months. I did the factory reset, updating the headphone OS, everything but still stopped working. And since I bought mine other than an Apple store I couldn’t exchange them and it would have cost me the price of the headphones to fix. Skip this faulty expensive headphones; there are others more reliable with just as decent audio
customer_reviews.author: A. D. Castro

customer_reviews.title: Warranty NEEDED
customer_reviews.text: I liked these BeatsX headphones for their noise canceling quality, sound, and they were okay for working out- but I purchased them in May 2018 and it is now March 2019 and the right headphone has no sound to it. I take very good care of the headphones, charge them when directed, and store them in their protective pouch and they broke 11 months after purchasing. Because of this I don't know that I would recommend them to anyone- especially because of the price. I have had $20 bluetooth headphones from Walmart that have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Carli yoho

customer_reviews.title: No longevity
customer_reviews.text: These were excellent wireless earbuds at first. They charged quickly using the same lightning charger as my iPhone. It was easy to switch from from one device to another - no disconnecting from the other device necessary. I really loved these until they just stopped accepting a charge after 7 months. They’re totally dead and past the warranty. It wasn’t worth the expense given their short life.
customer_reviews.author: Liz McNulty

customer_reviews.title: Battery life (overall)
customer_reviews.text: Spending over $100 on a BEATS product....lets just say that the battery and other important pieces of the product SHOULD last longer than 6 months!! I cant BELIEVE how this thing just GAVE OUT on me when i barely use it 2-3x a week.. * NOT EVEN consistently* - Additionally, I get it REPLACED with a "New one" which was a LIE. The "new one" ends up failing MISERABLY within a few months ! The mic just DIES on me for no reason and Apple says "the warranty ran out" .... REALLY? What a SHAME!!!! ZERO STARS!! BEATS/ APPLE better make this up.... Just makes NO SENSE~!
customer_reviews.author: Luigi

product_meta.title: BeatsX Wireless In-Ear Headphones (2016 Model) - Blue
feature_bullets: Perfect wireless companion for you to experience authentic, clear sound throughout your day with up to 8 hours of battery life
Take calls, control your music and activate Siri with RemoteTalk, requires iCloud account and macOS Sierra, iOS 10, watchOS 3 or later versions
Variety of eartip options offer personalized comfort and secure-fit wingtips provide stability
Magnetic ear buds keep your earphones tangle-free and easily coil up for compact portability
Comes with BeatsX earphones, removable secure-fit wingtips, eartips with four size options, lightning to USB-A charging cable and quick start guide
